from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, when, coalesce, lit, current_timestamp
from delta.tables import DeltaTable

# Define paths
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
target_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Investigations'
source_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Investigations_vw'

# Create SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("ECDS_Investigations_Update_Part1").getOrCreate()

# Read target table and source view
target_table = DeltaTable.forPath(spark, target_path)
source_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_path)

# Perform the MERGE operation
(target_table.alias("TGT")
 .merge(
    source_df.alias("SRC"),
    "TGT.visitarchiveid = SRC.visitarchiveid AND TGT.InvestigationOrder = SRC.InvestigationOrder"
 )
 .whenMatchedUpdate(
    condition = """
        (COALESCE(TGT.EC_Investigation_Date_Time, to_timestamp('1900-01-01')) != COALESCE(SRC.EC_Investigation_Date_Time, to_timestamp('1900-01-01'))) OR
        (COALESCE(TGT.EC_InvestigationCodeSNOMED, 'X') != COALESCE(SRC.EC_InvestigationCodeSNOMED, 'X')) OR
        (COALESCE(TGT.EC_InvestigationCodeCDS, 'X') != COALESCE(SRC.EC_InvestigationCodeCDS, 'X'))
    """,
    set = {
        "InvestigationDesc": "SRC.InvestigationDesc",
        "EC_Investigation_Date_Time": "SRC.EC_Investigation_Date_Time",
        "EC_InvestigationCodeSNOMED": "SRC.EC_InvestigationCodeSNOMED",
        "EC_InvestigationCodeCDS": "SRC.EC_InvestigationCodeCDS",
        "AmendedOn": "current_timestamp()"
    }
 )
 .whenNotMatchedInsert(
    values = {
        "visitarchiveid": "SRC.visitarchiveid",
        "InvestigationOrder": "SRC.InvestigationOrder",
        "InvestigationDesc": "SRC.InvestigationDesc",
        "EC_Investigation_Date_Time": "SRC.EC_Investigation_Date_Time",
        "EC_InvestigationCodeSNOMED": "SRC.EC_InvestigationCodeSNOMED",
        "EC_InvestigationCodeCDS": "SRC.EC_InvestigationCodeCDS"
    }
 )
 .whenNotMatchedBySource()
 .delete()
 .execute())

# Log the number of affected rows (optional)
affected_rows = target_table.toDF().count()
print(f"Number of rows in the target table after merge: {affected_rows}")

from pyspark.sql import SparkSession
from pyspark.sql.functions import col, when, coalesce, lit, current_timestamp

# Define paths
storage_account_name = "synapsestr"
delta_container_name = "nervecentre-delta"
target_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Investigations'
source_path = f'abfss://{delta_container_name}@{storage_account_name}.dfs.core.windows.net/ECDS_Investigations_vw'

# Create SparkSession
spark = SparkSession.builder.appName("ECDS_Investigations_Update_Part1").getOrCreate()

# Read target table and source view
target_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(target_path)
source_df = spark.read.format("delta").load(source_path)

# Perform the update
joined_df = target_df.join(source_df, ["visitarchiveid", "InvestigationOrder"], "full_outer")

updated_df = joined_df.select(
    coalesce(target_df.visitarchiveid, source_df.visitarchiveid).alias("visitarchiveid"),
    coalesce(target_df.InvestigationOrder, source_df.InvestigationOrder).alias("InvestigationOrder"),
    when(source_df.InvestigationDesc.isNotNull(), source_df.InvestigationDesc)
    .otherwise(target_df.InvestigationDesc).alias("InvestigationDesc"),
    when(source_df.EC_Investigation_Date_Time.isNotNull(), source_df.EC_Investigation_Date_Time)
    .otherwise(target_df.EC_Investigation_Date_Time).alias("EC_Investigation_Date_Time"),
    when(source_df.EC_InvestigationCodeSNOMED.isNotNull(), source_df.EC_InvestigationCodeSNOMED)
    .otherwise(target_df.EC_InvestigationCodeSNOMED).alias("EC_InvestigationCodeSNOMED"),
    when(source_df.EC_InvestigationCodeCDS.isNotNull(), source_df.EC_InvestigationCodeCDS)
    .otherwise(target_df.EC_InvestigationCodeCDS).alias("EC_InvestigationCodeCDS"),
    when(
        (coalesce(source_df.EC_Investigation_Date_Time, lit("1900-01-01")) != coalesce(target_df.EC_Investigation_Date_Time, lit("1900-01-01"))) |
        (coalesce(source_df.EC_InvestigationCodeSNOMED, lit("X")) != coalesce(target_df.EC_InvestigationCodeSNOMED, lit("X"))) |
        (coalesce(source_df.EC_InvestigationCodeCDS, lit("X")) != coalesce(target_df.EC_InvestigationCodeCDS, lit("X"))),
        current_timestamp()
    ).otherwise(target_df.AmendedOn).alias("AmendedOn")
)

# Remove rows that are not in the source
final_df = updated_df.join(source_df, ["visitarchiveid", "InvestigationOrder"], "left_semi")

# Write the updated DataFrame back to the Delta table
final_df.write.format("delta").mode("overwrite").save(target_path)

# Log the number of affected rows (optional)
affected_rows = final_df.count()
print(f"Number of rows in the target table after update: {affected_rows}")
